Name: trilateral retinoblastoma
Definition: A retinoblastoma that refers to bilateral retinoblastoma associated with an intracranial primitive neuroectodermal tumor located_in the pineal or suprasellar region.

Name: familial retinoblastoma
Definition: A retinoblastoma that refers to bilateral retinoblastoma associated with an intracranial primitive neuroectodermal tumor located_in the pineal or suprasellar region.

Name: bilateral retinoblastoma
Definition: A retinoblastoma that develops in both eyes.

Name: unilateral retinoblastoma
Definition: A retinoblastoma that effects only one eye.

Name: intraocular retinoblastoma
Definition: A retinoblastoma that is located_in the eye and has not spread to other parts of the body.

Name: obsolete relapsed retinoblastoma
Definition: A retinoblastoma that is located_in the eye and has not spread to other parts of the body.

Name: extraocular retinoblastoma
Definition: A retinoblastoma that has spread from the soft tissues surrounding the eye or to the optic nerve beyond the margin of resection to other parts of the body.
